name: PulpCraft
description:
A 2D Minecraft-like game for the Playdate that was made in a few days using Pulp. Inspired by Minicraft. Check out how I made it in this devlog:

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move around
  • S - A button (place block, swing sword, access crafting table)
  • A - B button (leave crafting table)
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change hotbar cursor

How to Play (without a Playdate):

  • Go to https://play.date/pulp and make an account
  • Create a new project
  • Click Import on the left side of the screen and select Pulpcraft.json
  • Click Play
